Title: Relates to creating an artificial intelligence working group in the department of education
Summary: Creates an artificial intelligence working group within the department of education for the purpose of developing guidance and a model policy on the safe and effective use of artificial intelligence in ways that benefit, and do not harm, pupils and educators.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to creating an artificial intelligence working group in the department of education; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
